[i]Talys Mercenary[/i] – When Ogma, Caeda's Shield enters, you may pay {X}. X can't be more than three. Create X 1/1 red Mercenary creature tokens with “{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”
[i]Loyal Shield[/i] – {2}, {T}: Put a shield counter onto target creature you control. If that creature has flying, put a +1/+1 counter onto Ogma.
